title: End of Innocence
description: Somewhere far in the north, in the middle of a dense forest, two girls have embarked on a sacred journey: a journey that is to end their carefree days among the children of their tribe. Grim as their world is, the destiny that is set upon them seems even darker, but such is often the way for the people of this land. End of Innocence is the first part of Fargoer, a series of fantasy short stories.
author: Petteri Hannila
